T02D2517:56b-21: sbyor ba 'dis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas /

T02D2517:56b-23: ma ya satvam sa ma ya stvam aa ham zhes
T02D2517:56b-24: brjod do // spyi'i snying po rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2517:56b-25: la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2517:56b-26: spyi'i snying po badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba dang
T02D2517:56b-27: brjod do // / rang gis lan gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02D2517:56b-28: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a yo g'i
T02D2517:56b-29: shva ri h'um zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang
T02D2517:56b-30: mdzad kyi rang gi sngags so //
T02D2517:56b-31: aom badzra satva h'um zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
T02D2517:56b-32: aom badzra ratna h'um zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02D2517:56b-33: aom badzra dharma h'um zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
T02D2517:56b-34: aom badzra karmma h'um zhes bya ba ni don yod grub pa'i'o //
T02D2517:56b-35: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam
T02D2517:56b-36: tshig gi phyag rgya la sogs pa dang sngags brjod
T02D2517:56b-37: par bya ste / thal mo dam du bsdams pa las //

T02D2517:56b-39: rdo rje thal mo bka' stsal te //
T02D2517:56b-40: rab tu bsdams phyir rdo rje bsdams //
T02D2517:56b-41: dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni //
T02D2517:56b-42: rdo rje bsdams las byung bas na /

T02D2517:56b-44: bsdams pa bla med bshad par bya //
T02D2517:56b-45: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
T02D2517:57a-0: @57a * // gung mo myu gu ltar mnyam bsgreng //
T02D2517:57a-1: gung mo nang du gshibs pa ni //
T02D2517:57a-2: sangs rgyas gnyis pa yin par bshad //
T02D2517:57a-3: gung mo rin chen 'dra ba dang //
T02D2517:57a-4: gung mo padma 'dra bar dgug / sangs rgyas lnga pa'i phyag rgya ni //
T02D2517:57a-5: de bzhin mdzub mo bkug pa'o //
T02D2517:57a-6: zla ba lta bu lag gnyis kyis //
T02D2517:57a-7: gung mo btang bar gyur pa dang //
T02D2517:57a-8: mthe bong mthe'u chung so sor bsgrengs //
T02D2517:57a-9: sems dpa'i rdo rje bsgreng rdo rje //
T02D2517:57a-10: dam tshig gi phyag rgya thams cad kyang /
T02D2517:57a-11: rang gi snying gar rdo rje rnam par bsams la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2517:57a-12: de nas rang gi lci la snga ma bzhin du rdo rje'i rnam par bsams nas /
T02D2517:57a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ljags la //
T02D2517:57a-14: badzra dzny'a na zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2517:57a-15: rang gi lce las ma ya stvam zhes bya ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya bsam par bya'o //
T02D2517:57a-16: yi ge aa: las rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02D2517:57a-17: las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02D2517:57a-18: las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2517:57a-19: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te //
T02D2517:57a-20: mnyam par gzhag pas gnyis su bya //
T02D2517:57a-21: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te //
T02D2517:57a-22: de nas bcing ba rab tu bshad //
T02D2517:57a-23: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni //
T02D2517:57a-24: g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya //
T02D2517:57a-25: phyag rgya byang chub mchog yin te //
T02D2517:57a-26: sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o //
T02D2517:57a-28: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur chos gos kyi mtha'
T02D2517:57a-29: ma 'dzin pa'i sbyor pas nyid kyi thugs kar 'jog
T02D2517:57a-30: cing / g-yas pas sa gnon pa'i spyor ba 'di ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
T02D2517:57a-31: de nyid las phyag g-yas pa mchog sbyin pa'i tshul
T02D2517:57a-32: du 'jog pa 'di ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o
T02D2517:57a-33: // ting nge 'dzin mchog ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
T02D2517:57a-34: mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya nyid las /
T02D2517:57a-35: phyag g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul du 'jog pa 'di ni /
T02D2517:57a-37: bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yis //
T02D2517:57a-38: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i'o //
T02D2517:57a-39: rang gi snying gar sems dpa'i rdo rje rnam par bsams la /
T02D2517:57a-40: phyag rgya chen po bcings bar bya'o //
T02D2517:57b-0: ji skad du bshad pa'i byang @57b chub sems mchog
T02D2517:57b-1: ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po'o
T02D2517:57b-2: // mi bskyod pa'i ni phyag g-yon pa brla la bkan te /
T02D2517:57b-3: ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba dang /
T02D2517:57b-4: g-yas pas sa gnon par byed pa'o //
T02D2517:57b-5: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ni de nyid las phyag g-yas pa mchog sbyin la mngon du phyogs pa'o //
T02D2517:57b-6: 'od dpag tu med pa'i ni ting nge 'dzin no //
T02D2517:57b-7: mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya de nyid las phyag g-yas
T02D2517:57b-8: pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa
T02D2517:57b-9: 'di ni don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya chen po'o
T02D2517:57b-10: // rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje bsnams pa'o //
T02D2517:57b-11: lhag ma rnams ni rdo rje rin po che dang /
T02D2517:57b-13: sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o //
T02D2517:57b-14: rdo rje sems dpa' ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu
T02D2517:57b-15: tshur rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pas bsgyings pa
T02D2517:57b-16: / phyag g-yas pas dang po'i rdo rje bsor zhing
T02D2517:57b-17: rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis bsnams pa'o
T02D2517:57b-18: / // de nas de bzhin du sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa bcings nas /
T02D2517:57b-19: bdag nyid kyi gnas bzhir byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D2517:57b-20: rang gi snying gar satva badzri aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2517:57b-21: rin chen rdo rje ma bcings la ;
T02D2517:57b-22: dpral ba'i phyogs su ratna badzri aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2517:57b-23: chos kyi rdo rje ma bcings la lkog ma'i phyogs
T02D2517:57b-24: su dharmma badzri aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes bya
T02D2517:57b-25: ba dang / las kyi rdo rje ma bcings la
T02D2517:57b-26: spyi bor karmma badzri aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes
T02D2517:57b-27: bya bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2517:57b-28: de nas aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
T02D2517:57b-31: tishtha dri dho me bha ba /
T02D2517:57b-32: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D2517:57b-33: aa nu ra kto me bha ba /
T02D2517:57b-34: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D2517:57b-35: sarbba siddhimme pra yatstsha sarba karmma su tsa me /
T02D2517:57b-36: tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um /
T02D2517:57b-37: ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga b'a na sarba
T02D2517:57b-38: ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa badzr'i bha
T02D2517:57b-39: ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa: zhes pa'i
T02D2517:57b-40: yi ge brgya pa 'di lan gsum bzlas pas brtan
T02D2517:57b-41: par byas la / phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mos bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bar bya'o //
T02D2517:57b-42: de nas dbang bskur ba blang bar bya ste /
T02D2517:57b-43: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma bcings la /
T02D2517:58a-1: a'a: las rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po
T02D2517:58a-2: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas bzhugs pa bskyed la
T02D2517:58a-3: / aom badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri h'um badzri ni h'um aa bhishinytsa m'am zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2517:58a-4: mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2517:58a-5: dpral ba'i dbus su yi ge h'um las mi bskyod
T02D2517:58a-6: pa sku mdog sngon po sa gnon pa'i phyag rgyas
T02D2517:58a-7: bzhugs pa dang / aom badzra badzri ni h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2517:58a-8: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2517:58a-9: rna ba g-yas pa'i steng du yi ge tr'am las rin chen 'byung ldan gser btso ma'i mdog can /
T02D2517:58a-10: mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rgyas bzhugs pa dang /
T02D2517:58a-11: aom ratna badzri ni h'um aa bhishinytsa m'am zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2517:58a-12: 'od dpag tu med pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2517:58a-13: mgo bo'i rgyab tu yi ge hr'i: las 'od dpag
T02D2517:58a-14: tu med pa sku mdog dmar po ting nge 'dzin
T02D2517:58a-15: mchog gi phyag rgyas bzhugs pa dang /
T02D2517:58a-16: aom dharmma badzri ni h'um aa bhishnytsa m'am zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2517:58a-17: don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2517:58a-18: rna ba g-yon pa'i steng du yi ge aa las
T02D2517:58a-19: don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang gu mi 'jigs
T02D2517:58a-20: pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgyas bzhugs pa bskyed /
T02D2517:58a-21: aom karmma badzri ni h'um aa bhishinytsa m'am zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o //
T02D2517:58a-22: rdo rje thal mo bcings pa las ;
T02D2517:58a-23: / mthe bo gnyis ni bsnol byas la //
T02D2517:58a-24: mdzub mo'i rtse mo bkug nas ni //

T02D2517:58a-26: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad //

T02D2517:58a-28: gung mo gnyis bkug ste rin po che 'dra bar byas pa dang /
T02D2517:58a-29: gung mo dang srin lag dang mthe'u chung padma 'dra bar byas pa dang /
T02D2517:58a-31: de'i rjes la aom tum zhes bya ba phyag rgya
T02D2517:58a-32: dang bcas pa 'dis go cha bcing bar bya ba
T02D2517:58a-33: ni / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis snying gar mdud pa bcing pa'i tshul du bya zhing /
T02D2517:58a-34: de bzhin du mgrin pa dang ltag pa dang /
T02D2517:58a-35: yang snying ga dang nu ma'i bar dang yang snying ga dang mgrin pa dang rgyab dang ;
T02D2517:58a-36: dpral ba'i phyogs su mdud pa bcing pa'i tshul du byas la /
T02D2517:58a-37: mgo bo la phreng ba bcing pa'i tshul du byas te /
T02D2517:58a-38: sgeg pa dang bcas pas mtha' ma la sogs pa'i sor mo thams cad bkrol te /
T02D2517:58b-0: mthar mnyam pa'i thal mo dang badzra tu shye ho: zhes bya @58b bas mnyes par bya'o //
T02D2517:58b-1: de nas lag pa g-yas pas dang po'i rdo rje
T02D2517:58b-2: dang lag pa g-yon pas dang po'i rdo rje dang
T02D2517:58b-3: bcas pa'i dril bu blangs te /
T02D2517:58b-4: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02D2517:58b-5: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02D2517:58b-6: sangs rgyas kun du rab grub phyir //
T02D2517:58b-7: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
T02D2517:58b-8: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti tvam aa bhishinytsa mi
T02D2517:58b-9: tishtha badzra sa ma ya stvam zhes bya ba 'dis
T02D2517:58b-10: rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2517:58b-11: bdag po'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02D2517:58b-12: de nas rdo rje dang dril bu rang gi mgor bzhag la /
T02D2517:58b-13: aom badzra satva tva tvam aa bhi shinytsa mi badzra
T02D2517:58b-14: n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta kye rdo rje
T02D2517:58b-15: kun du bzang po zhes bya bas ming gi dbang
T02D2517:58b-17: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02D2517:58b-18: rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug / khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D2517:58b-19: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan /
T02D2517:58b-20: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma
T02D2517:58b-21: ya tishtha ae sha tvam dha ra ya m'i badzra
T02D2517:58b-22: satva hi hi hi hi h'um zhes bya ba 'dis
T02D2517:58b-23: dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blang bar bya'o
T02D2517:58b-24: // de nas sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i
T02D2517:58b-25: mchod pa bzhis bdag nyid la yang dag par mchod
T02D2517:58b-26: // nas / bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2517:58b-27: yi ge h'um las grub pa'i rdo rje de kho na nyid kyis gzungs bar bya ste /
T02D2517:58b-28: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D2517:58b-29: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D2517:58b-30: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D2517:58b-31: rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag / bcom ldan
T02D2517:58b-32: 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o zhes bya ba
T02D2517:58b-33: ni de kho na nyid do //
T02D2517:58b-34: yi ge aa las byung ba'i dril bu chos kyis dkrol bar bya ste /
T02D2517:58b-35: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i bdag po /
T02D2517:58b-36: dam pa kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug gi dam
T02D2517:58b-37: pa de nyid kyis chos kyi mchog gi bka' yang
T02D2517:58b-38: dag par gsungs pa de ni /
T02D2517:58b-39: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
T02D2517:58b-40: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog / srid pa'i mchog ni mdzad pa yin //
T02D2517:58b-41: mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa ni dril bu'o //
T02D2517:58b-42: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas nas sam /
T02D2517:59a-1: dgyes par byas nas dkrol na /
T02D2517:59a-2: chos thams cad de kho na nyid rab tu rtogs
T02D2517:59a-3: pa 'bebs pas sgrib pa thams cad rnams par dag
T02D2517:59a-4: par byed cing // rdo rje thams cad 'bebs pa dang /
T02D2517:59a-7: sems dang bsgrub par byed do //
T02D2517:59a-8: de nas srid pa rnam par dag pa'i thabs kyi
T02D2517:59a-9: mchod pas thams cad mchog pas thams cad kyi gsang
T02D2517:59a-10: ba chen po rtag tu bsten par bya ba yin
T02D2517:59a-12: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung //
T02D2517:59a-13: sdug bsngal chen po dag pa'i phyir //
T02D2517:59a-14: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02D2517:59a-15: dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed //
T02D2517:59a-16: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni //
T02D2517:59a-17: ci 'dod par ni bsten bzhin du //
T02D2517:59a-18: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2517:59a-19: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
T02D2517:59a-20: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2517:59a-21: bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya
T02D2517:59a-22: ba'i theg pa chen po'i dam tshig gi sbyor ba
T02D2517:59a-23: ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig go //
T02D2517:59a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis /
T02D2517:59a-28: 'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pas //
T02D2517:59a-29: phyag rgya'i dam tshig ces su bsgrags //
T02D2517:59a-30: yid kyi gzugs ni bstan phyir ro //
T02D2517:59a-32: mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D2517:59a-33: de la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas /
T02D2517:59a-34: ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //
T02D2517:59a-35: mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe //
T02D2517:59a-36: de srid mtshungs med sems can don //
T02D2517:59a-37: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02D2517:59a-38: gsang ba dang bcas dam tshig thabs //
T02D2517:59a-39: bsod nams byin rlabs sgrub byed cing //
T02D2517:59a-40: rtag tu dngos grub kun dbang phyug / rtag tu 'gro ba'i don byed do //
T02D2517:59a-41: dam tshig 'di yis nges par ni //
T02D2517:59a-42: ci bde bar ni mchog sgrub byed //
T02D2517:59a-43: sems can skal ngan spyod ngan pas //
T02D2517:59a-45: dam tshig dbang phyug kun gyi bdag / rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02D2517:59a-46: dam pa'i dbang phyug kun mchog tu //
T02D2517:59a-47: 'dod chags chen pos grub par byed //
T02D2517:59a-48: las kyi tshogs rnams 'grub pa yis //
T02D2517:59b-0: rang @59b gzhan phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor dag / bsgrub par bya ba thams cad ni //
T02D2517:59b-1: don yod par ni mchog 'grub can //
T02D2517:59b-3: dam tshig sdug bsngal kun sel zhing //
T02D2517:59b-4: dpal ldan 'da' bar dka' ba yin //
T02D2517:59b-5: zhes mchog tu gsang ba 'di gsungs so ;
T02D2517:59b-6: / de'i rjes la aom badzra satva h'um zhes bya
T02D2517:59b-7: ba rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus
T02D2517:59b-8: su bkod la rdo rje'i tshig gis brjod do //
T02D2517:59b-9: phyag rgya chen po bcings nas yid kyis nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas te /
T02D2517:59b-10: aa k'a ro mu kham sarbba dhamm'a n'i /
T02D2517:59b-11: a'adya nutpnnatva ta ces bya ba yid kyis brjod la /
T02D2517:59b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nam mkha' lta bur bsam par bya'o //
T02D2517:59b-13: de nas nam mkha'i phyogs der yi ge yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D2517:59b-14: de'i steng du bam las chu dang /
T02D2517:59b-15: de'i steng du lam las gser dang /
T02D2517:59b-16: de'i steng du bam las rgya mtsho chen po dang ;
T02D2517:59b-17: rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su h'um sum h'um zhes
T02D2517:59b-18: bya ba las ri rab chen po sna bzhi'i rang
T02D2517:59b-19: bzhin can / zur bzhi pa rin po che thams cad kyis nye bar spras pa bskyed la /
T02D2517:59b-20: aom badzra dri dho ma bha ba raksha sarbbam sv'a h'a /
T02D2517:59b-21: zhes bya bas snga ma bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2517:59b-22: de'i steng du sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje 'khor los gzhal yas khang du sprul la /
T02D2517:59b-23: de'i dbus su yi ge aa las seng ge'i gdan /
T02D2517:59b-24: de'i steng du yi ge hr'i: las padma rnam par bsams nas /
